name: Swift-2.0
body:
### Use Xcode 7 migration tool
When you open an existing project in Xcode 7, it will ask you **convert to Latest Swift Syntax?** or you can manually convert using the migration tool _`Edit menu->Convert-> To Latest Swift Syntax`_.

### Removed `#` in function parameter so we have to use double name.

### Unnamed parameter should be marked by `_`

### Option set type   
   Calendar components, UIAutoresizing mask  
   eg: http://www.rockhoppertech.com/blog/swift-2-optionsettype/

### new() is not available

### println() is replaced with print()

### Use let the instead of let if the value is never mutating

### String is not collection type. string.characters.count     
     https://developer.apple.com/swift/blog/?id=30

### global function contains() is not available use array.contains

### Cannot use like dict.keys.array,, use Array(dict.keys)

### setTranslatesAutoresizingMaskIntoConstraints not available

### array.sorted not available use array.sort

### find is not available use indexOf

### advance is not available use advanceBy

### join is unavailable use joinWithSeparator

JsonObjectWithData
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/32408722/array-is-unavailable-please-construct-an-array-from-your-lazy-sequence-array
http://swiftdoc.org/swift-2/type/LazyMapCollection/
major changes here https://www.hackingwithswift.com/swift2
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
